title: Replication
ruleIdDescription: A unique identifier for this replication rule (3-255 characters)
destinationDescription: The destination container where the objects will be replicated
priorityDescription: The rule priority (1-999). The higher the number, the higher the priority
replicationApplicationDescription: Choose whether the rule applies to all objects or only certain objects
replicationApplicationLimited: Restrict the application of this rule
replicationApplicationForAll: Apply to all objects in the container
replicationApplicationLimitedHelper: You can limit the scope of this rule by using a prefix and/or tags
prefixDescription: Replicate only objects whose key begins with this prefix
tagsDescription: You can limit the scope of this rule to key-value pairs
useStorageClassDescription: Apply a different storage class to replicated objects
deleteMarkerReplicationDescription: Also replicate delete markers to destination
addReplicationToastSuccessDescription: The replication rule has been created.
editReplicationToastSuccessDescription: The replication rule has been modified.
replicationRuleNotFound: The replication rule was not found.
tagsDisabledHelper: You cannot use tags to filter because the replication rule replicates delete markers
deleteMarkerDisabledHelper: You cannot replicate delete markers because the replication rule uses object tags to filter objects
ruleIdMinLengthError: The rule ID must contain at least {{min}} characters
ruleIdMaxLengthError: The rule ID cannot exceed {{max}} characters
ruleIdRegexError: The Rule ID can only contain printable ASCII characters
errorDestinationVersioningDisabled: Replication requires versioning to be enabled on the destination container
errorDestinationFetchingDetails: An error occurred while retrieving the destination container details
errorDestinationObjectLockDisabled: Replication requires object lock to be enabled on the destination container
noAvailableDestinationContainersAlert: To use asynchronous replication, you need another container with versioning enabled.
replicationRequiresVersioningAlert: To use asynchronous replication, versioning must be enabled.
disabledClassDestinationHelper: Select a target container to enable this option
warning1AZTo3AZ: The High Performance storage class is not available with the 3-AZ deployment mode. This means that your source objects stored in High Performance will be replicated, by default, to the standard storage class, which is the closest storage class in terms of usage.
warning3AZTo1AZ: The Cold Archive storage class is only available with the 3-AZ deployment mode and in the Paris region. By default, your source objects stored in the Cold Archive will be replicated to Infrequent Access, which is the closest storage class in terms of usage.
inconsistentReplicationRulesAlert: Some replication rules have a destination that has been deleted. Please delete these rules before creating new replications.
deletedDestinationTooltip: The destination container has been deleted.
